channel.title: CVE Feed for Libsyn -- Libsyn Publisher Hub
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Libsyn -- Libsyn Publisher Hub

item.title: CVE-2024-32141|2024-04-15T08:39:48.477Z -- Libsyn -- Libsyn Publisher Hub
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Libsyn Libsyn Publisher Hub.This issue affects Libsyn Publisher Hub: from n/a through 1.4.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-32140|2024-04-15T07:04:39.546Z -- Libsyn -- Libsyn Publisher Hub
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Libsyn Libsyn Publisher Hub allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Libsyn Publisher Hub: from n/a through 1.4.4.
